IMUSim
Package imusim :: Package behaviours :: Module basestation :: Class BodyModelReconstructor

Class BodyModelReconstructor

source code

Reconstructs body model movements from individual joint data.

This behaviour combines a PostureReconstructor and a PositionEstimator to update a SampledBodyModel.

Instance Methods

source code 

Initialise behaviour.

Parameters:
  • bodyModel - SampledBodyModel to update.
  • postureReconstructor - PostureReconstructor subclass to use.
  • positionEstimator - PositionEstimator subclass to use.
  • initialTime - Initial time.

handleData(self, data, dt)

source code 

Update the body model with new data.

Parameters:
  • data - A dict containing data, passed directly to both the posture and position estimators.
  • dt - Time elapsed since last call to this method or __init__.
